entries.title: How Corrupt China’s Officialdom? The bottom line gets progressively lower/They exposed in 6 month
entries.description:
#chinainsights 
Four female officials have been dubbed the Four Beauties of modern China, or as some media call them, the Four Sleeping Beauties. Of course, "sleeping" here means more than sleeping. According to the Chinese Communist Party, it refers to inappropriate relationships with male officials. 

Have questions? Do you have something to share with us about China? We want to hear from you!
